There was a slow nod from RODIMUS. "Perhaps =
we can do something about
that.=94 He frowned thoughtfully. =93If the Auobo=
ts knew where we were
they would have hope, and perhaps that could turn the=
 war in our favor
even back then. Perhaps they can win the battles they wou=
ld not
ordinarily have won and the outcome would be different =96 for all o=
f
us.=94

There was a straightening from Rodimus as he looked off in the
di=
stance contemplating all the ramifications. =93Maybe the humans would
never=
 have to be put in danger and we could win the war.=94 He looked
back at WH=
EELIE, =93Optimus wouldn=92t have to die.=94 He smiled. =93And
perhaps the =
golden age would still be in affect.=94
